title: Not Resuming Download
body: I see a ton of people complaining about this. I have a good internet connection but am tired of always leaving it open. I never hear what the developers of the game have to say. Riot doesn't give a crap. Do to bugs I would have the window shrink to a tiny box and can't see anything. After a while it would crash and have to start over. It happens when I'm doing something else or starting another game. This is just r%%%%%ed. It shouldn't be that hard to allow downloads to resume. It's been over a year that this is happening and they just don't listen just like the screw up the champion buffs every time. They don't learn their lesson.

replies.body: It does really suck whenever the patcher/installer craps out and you lose all that update progress =\ . Since League doesn't have a pause feature at all, you might have better luck by switching to an ethernet cable and going through the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you cover the basic troubleshooting steps.
